page.title: 05SATURDAY AT NEW WELLBURY
page.content: Afternoon and evening {1.45}H.parents arrive to take her home for weekend. {2.30}Tea and cakes for everyone. {3.00}Men go out shooting.Catch a hare, will be hung for week,then casseroled. {4.00}V.prepares evening meal. {6.00}Children bath.Play in room. {6.30}Men to 'pub' in Pegsdon. {7.30}Men back,light barbeque in rain. {8.30}Two more guests for meal.Drinks served.Sweet corn,herbs and butter wrapped in foil,cooked on barbeque. {9.30}Corns served with hot wholemeal rolls and rump steaks are barbequed. {10.00}Steaks served with hot potatoes and various salads. {10.45}Profiteroles and mousse.The meal was accompanied by wine and champagne. {11.00}Coffee,French cheese,port and brandy. {2.00}Evening guests depart.
